com.java.model.map

Class Country

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.java.model.map.Country

  • public class Country
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models a country by giving a name, a continent to belong, a conqueror player id, and the number of armies placed on the country.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Arnav Bhardwaj, Karan Dhingra, Ghalia Elkerdi, Sahil Singh Sodhi, Cristian Rodriguez

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Country(java.lang.String countryName, java.lang.String continentName)
      A country is created by provinding the name and the continent name.
